text:
InKind | Senior Ruby on Rails developer | REMOTE or Austin, TX | Full-time | inKind.com

We're looking for someone super passionate about food and the hospitality industry to join our small, venture backed team. We create personalized experiences at restaurants, in addition to financing growing restaurants.

Looking to make our first Rails hire, so need someone senior to be able to take the majority of the backend work off our CTO's plate.

Email miles at inkind dot com to chat!
